dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradients and spot heights. On recto: city districts are named, shows points of interest, including monasteries and tourist information. On verso: Map shows international and provincial boundaries, border crossing, roads, railroads, and tourist sites. Some buildings are shown pictorially. Includes a glossary of used terms, bar chart showing rainfall and temperature, and road distances table.
